name: 伊泰·本森

last_movies.title: 上帝加我好友 第一季
The Priest, the Whore, and the Man at the Door

introduction: （机翻）以色列裔美国演员，来自以色列海法和佛罗里达州劳德代尔堡，希伯来语和英语流利。十几岁时，他就读于Stagedoor庄园表演艺术中心。Etai 拥有广泛的戏剧背景，曾在密歇根大学和传奇的莫斯科艺术剧院接受培训。他还在大学期间在圣路易斯的穆尼首次亮相。舞台上的重要角色包括：乐队来访（百老汇原版演员）中的“Papi”，Wicked（百老汇）中的“Boq”和巴黎美国人（全国巡演）中的“亚当”以及无数的地区作品。他目前居住在纽约市。（2017年11月）Israeli-American actor, hailing from Haifa, Israel and Fort Lauderdale, Florida, fluent in both Hebrew and English.As a teenager, he attended Stagedoor Manor Center for the Performing Arts.With an extensive background in theatre, Etai trained at the University of Michigan and the legendary Moscow Art Theatre. He made his professional debut at the Muny in St. Louis while still in college. Prominent roles onstage include: "Papi" in The Band's Visit (Original Broadway Cast), "Boq" in Wicked (Broadway), and "Adam" in An American in Paris (National Tour) along with countless regional productions.He currently resides in New York City. (November, 2017)
